description:
Collect inventory data and metrics of your hosts and sends it to the New Relic platform.


What's Changed
- chore(deps): update dependency newrelic/nri-prometheus to v2.27.6 in https://github.com/newrelic/infrastructure-agent/pull/2177
- chore(deps): update dependency newrelic/nri-flex to v1.17.3 in https://github.com/newrelic/infrastructure-agent/pull/2180
- chore(deps): update dependency newrelic/nri-winservices to v1.4.2 in https://github.com/newrelic/infrastructure-agent/pull/2181
- chore(deps): update dependency newrelic/nri-docker to v2.6.7 in https://github.com/newrelic/infrastructure-agent/pull/2182
- Updated the go version to 1.25.6 in https://github.com/newrelic/infrastructure-agent/pull/2183
- Addressed High Vulnerabilities CVE-2025-61726 and CVE-2025-61728
Full Changelog: https://github.com/newrelic/infrastructure-agent/compare/1.72.1...1.72.2
